`comstab` is a R package that contains the basic functions to apply the unified framework for partitioning the drivers of stability of ecological communities (Segrestin <i>et al.</i> in prep).

## Installation

You can install the current version from GitHub with:

```{r, eval = FALSE}
require(devtools)
devtools::install_github("jsegrestin/comstab")
```

## Dependencies

Apart from base, `comstab`depends on `stats`, `graphics`, and `Ternary`
